SMW Subobject for MarrentillHigh Alchemy value: 6Examine: An unfinished herb tea made up of water and marrentill.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Herb tea mixUses infobox: ItemImage: File:Herb tea mix (marrentill).pngWeight: 0.050Value: 10Version anchor: MarrentillRelease date: 28 February 2005Item ID: 4468

Herb tea mixes are obtained by mixing a cup of hot water with two guam leaf, a harralander, and a marrentill.

It is made during One Small Favour to prepare a cup of Guthix rest. Completing a Guthix rest grants a total of 59 Herblore experience (14, 14.5, 15, and 15.5 experience per herb added). If the incorrect amount of herbs is added, or the herbs are mixed in the wrong order, ruined herb tea is obtained.

Mixes[edit | edit source]

There are 10 types of herb tea mixes depending on the ingredients contained in the herb tea.

Image Examine
An unfinished herb tea made up of water and harralander.
An unfinished herb tea made up of water and guam.
An unfinished herb tea made up of water and marrentill.
An unfinished herb tea made up of water, harralander and marrentill.
An unfinished herb tea made up of water, harralander and guam.
An unfinished herb tea made up of water and 2 doses of guam.
An unfinished herb tea made up of water, guam and marrentill.
An unfinished herb tea made up of water, harralander, marrentill and guam.
An unfinished herb tea made up of water, 2 doses of guam and marrentill.
An unfinished herb tea made up of water, 2 doses of guam and harralander.
